summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation; accepting a $22,829 grant from the Seattle Housing Authority (SHA) for the purpose of providing a recreation program for seniors residing at Columbia Place and Barton Place; increasing the expenditure allowances in the department's 1998 budget; creating a necessary position; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
